title: Amrita Rao's sister Preetika Rao makes serious allegations against TV star Harshad Arora
summary: Preetika Rao, actress and sister of Amrita Rao, has made serious allegations against her former co-star Harshad Arora. In response to a fan posting romantic scenes from their show 'Beintehaa', Preetika accused Harshad of being a womanizer in an Instagram chat that surfaced on Reddit. She expressed anger at the circulation of their on-screen romantic scenes and claimed Harshad "sleeps with every woman he finds in the industry."
content:
Amrita Rao's sister, Preetika Rao, has been a part of movies and the television industry. She gained popularity for her role as Aaliya Zain Abdullah in Beintehaa, where she starred opposite Harshad Arora. Their on-screen chemistry was widely appreciated during the show's run from 2013 to 2014.

Recently, Preetika made headlines after responding angrily to a fan who shared romantic scenes from Beintehaa featuring her and Harshad. In an Instagram chat that later appeared on Reddit, she made serious allegations against her former co-star, calling him a womanizer.

In the leaked chat, Preetika wrote, "Shame on you! For putting these videos on your page when I have repeatedly requested you not to post my videos with a man who sleeps with every woman he finds in the industry!" She further added that only 5% of their scenes involved physical contact, and she objected to these particular scenes being circulated against her wishes.

After Beintehaa, Preetika went on to appear in shows like Love Ka Hai Intezaar and Laal Ishq, while Harshad Arora worked in various shows including Dahleez, Sasural Simar Ka, and Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin. As of now, Harshad has not responded to these allegations, and Preetika has not provided any additional details about her claims.
